headline: Taking Stock of Thermo Fisher Scientific (TMO) Valuation After Analyst Upgrades and Bioprocessing, Cardio Testing Moves
summary: Thermo Fisher Scientific (TMO) just picked up fresh buy ratings on the back of its Asian bioprocessing expansion and a new cardiovascular risk testing partnership, and investors are treating that combination as a meaningful confidence signal. See our latest analysis for Thermo Fisher Scientific. Although Thermo Fisher’s share price is slightly softer in the very short term, a roughly 21 percent 90 day share price return suggests momentum is rebuilding as investors reprice its Asia buildout...
